items.sentence: Every time I see Tom, he's talking on his phone.
Tom asked me to return the money I had borrowed.
Tom canceled his appointment at the last moment.
Tom is one of the wealthiest men in the country.
Tom leaned in and gave Mary a kiss on the cheek.
Tom marked a sentence with a yellow highlighter.
Can Tom really be as rich as people think he is?
I first met Tom in a little bar outside of town.
You should just do what Tom is asking you to do.
Let's see if Tom can manage to do it by himself.
